surname Song; the Song dynasty (960-1279); also Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
фамилия Песня; династия Сун (960–1279); также Песня Южных династий 南朝 宋 (420-479)
rtega_mnemonic:
宋宋RS𠳼Song dynasty, surname, a state in the Warring States period
  • dynasty 宀 in which literature was spread by use of woodblock 木 printing
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: A building 宀 made out of wood 木
purpleculture_examples:
南宋 [ nán sòng ]: the Southern Song dynasty (1127-1279)
北宋 [ běi sòng ]: the Northern Song Dynasty (960-1127)
唐宋 [ táng sòng ]: the Tang (618-907) and Song (960-1279) dynasties
唐宋八大家 [ táng sòng bā dà jiā ]: Eight Giants of Tang and Song prose, esp. involved in the Classics movement 古文运动 , namely: Han Yu 韩愈 , Liu Zongyuan 柳宗元 , Ouyang Xiu 欧阳修 , the Three Su father and sons 三苏 , Wang Anshi 王安石 , Zeng Gong 曾巩
仿宋 [ fǎng sòng ]: imitation Song dynasty typeface; Fangsong font

heisig_chinese_memo: The Song dynasty was so-called because people kept trees in their houses and as a consequence birds sung songs in them.
Ru_Notes:
Сун (宋) — название нескольких династий в китайской истории: царство Сун (11 век до н.э. — 3 век до н.э.), династия Сун (420г. — 470г., также Лю Сун), империя или династия Сун (960г. — 1279г.). Обычно подразумевают последнюю.
Кандзи действительно больше ничего не значит, используется в именах.
Не путать: 栄 (さかえる、エイ расцвет).
Ru_Words:
宋そう
  • династия Сун (в Китае)
    • 入宋にっそう
  • путешествие в Китай (во времена династии Сун)
    • 北宋ほくそう
  • северный [период империи] Сун
    • 南宋なんそう
  • южный [период империи] Сун
Ru_trainchinese: sòng: (сущ) Сун (династия в Китае, 420-479); Сун (китайская фамилия)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the tree (木) under the roof (宀) dwells there
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The Song dynasty was so-called because people kept trees in their houses and as a consequence birds sung songs in them.
humanum_full_description_en:
Jiajin inscriptions from "宀" from " wood ", the original meaning of the configuration is unclear. Xu Zhongshu believes that the image is shaped like a house with wood as a beam and pillar, and its original meaning is a house.

Wang Xiantang believes that " wood " is the divine lord, as if the divine lord is placed in the house, the original meaning is the ancestral temple, and Xunju is a homophonic borrowing. According to the " Song " text, the original meaning is not found, pending examination. "Shuowen": "Ju also. Cong Luo Congmu. Reading if you send." Duan Yucai's note: "This meaning has not been passed on."

Oracle is used as names of people and places. Such as "Compilation" 07898 "In Song Dynasty", 20240 "To Song Dynasty", 20034 "Yi Si Bu, Wang Yu Zi Song." Bronze inscriptions are also used as country names, personal names, surnames, etc., such as Hai Ding: "Grandson of Song Zhuang Gong Hai, I will meet the Ding from the first moment." Le big disciple bottle: "Le big disciple Song". In the seventeenth year, Ling Ge: "Shangkugongsi (teacher) Song Ding, and Yehuo is in charge."

In the Western Zhou Dynasty, Zhou Gong named the microzi to start the Song Dynasty and established the capital of Shangqiu. The Song State is a descendant of Yin and Shang Dynasty, and it is in Jinwen. Song Gongqi said: "There is Yin Tianyi Tang (Tang) Sun Song Gongyu." It is clearly stated that Song Gongqi is a descendant of Shang Tang.

Shuihudi Qin Bamboo Slips and Mawangdui Han Bamboo Slips are both used as country names. "Mawangdui. "Book of Strategists in the Warring States Period": "Song and Zhongshan cut and cut, and the country died in the Sui Dynasty."
humanum_short_description_en: Jia Jin inscription from "宀" from " wood ", the original meaning of the configuration is unclear. Xu Zhongshu believes that the image is shaped like a house with wood as a beam and pillar, and its original meaning is a house.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「宀」從「木」，構形本義未明。徐中舒認為象以木為樑柱而成居宅之形，本義是居宅。

　　王獻唐認為「木」為神主，象置神主於屋中，本義為宗廟，訓居乃同音假借。按「宋」文例未見用其本義者，待考。《說文》：「居也。从宀从木。讀若送。」段玉裁注：「此義未見經傳」。

　　甲骨文用作人名、地名。如《合集》07898「于宋」、20240「往宋」，20034「乙巳卜，王侑子宋。」金文亦用作國名、人名、姓氏等，如𧽙亥鼎：「宋莊公之孫𧽙亥，自乍會鼎」。樂𤔲大徒瓶：「樂大𤔲徒子宋」。十七年坓令戈：「上庫工帀(師)宋定，冶厜執齊。」

　　西周時，周公封微子啓於宋，建都商丘。宋國是殷商的後裔，於金文有徵。宋公䜌簠銘曰：「有殷天乙唐(湯)孫宋公䜌」，明言宋公䜌是商湯的後裔。

　　睡虎地秦簡、馬王堆漢簡皆用為國名。《馬王堆．戰國縱橫家書》：「宋、中山數伐數割，而國隋(隨)以亡。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「宀」從「木」，構形本義未明。徐中舒認為象以木為樑柱而成居宅之形，本義是居宅。

宋字的基本解释

宋
sòng
中国周代诸侯国名，在今河南省商丘市一带。
中国朝代名：南宋。宋代。宋词。
响度单位，一宋约相当于人耳刚能听到的声音响度的一千倍，等于1000毫宋。
姓。

宋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sòng］
［《廣韻》蘇統切，去宋，心。］
(1)周代诸侯国名。子姓。周武王灭商后，封商王纣子武庚於商旧都（今河南商丘）。成王时，武庚叛乱，被杀，又以其地封与纣的庶兄微子启，号宋公，为宋国。战国初年曾迁都彭城（今江苏徐州）。公元前286年为齐所灭。辖地在今河南东部及山东、江苏、安徽之间。
(2)朝代名。南朝之一。公元420年晋北府兵将领刘裕代晋称帝，国号宋，建都建康（今江苏南京），史称刘宋。有今长江流域和珠江流域各省。479年为南齐所代。共历八帝，六十年。
(3)朝代名。五代末公元960年，赵匡胤（宋太祖）代後周称帝，国号宋，定都汴梁（今河南开封），史称北宋。靖康元年（1126年）金兵攻入汴梁，徽宗、钦宗被俘，北宋亡。次年赵构（宋高宗）在南京（今河南商丘）称帝，后建都临安（今浙江杭州），史称南宋。帝昺祥兴二年（1279年）为元所灭。两宋共历十八帝，三百二十年。
(4)政权名。隋末农民起义领袖辅公祏所建国号。公元623年建立，建都丹杨（今江苏南京），有今江苏南部和浙江北部。公元624年为唐所灭。
(5)政权名。元末红巾军刘福通等所建国号。公元1

宋字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　宋； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页282第12
【唐韻】【韻會】蘇統切【集韻】蘇綜切，?音送。【說文】居也，从宀从木。【徐曰】木所以成室，以居人也。　又國名，微子所封地，卽閼伯之商丘。【左傳·昭十七年】宋，大辰之虛也。　又州名，隋置宋爲應天府，今河南歸德府是也。又姓。

宋字的源字形

宋字的起名意思

：中国周代诸侯国名；中国朝代名，响度单位。

Song
Basic explanation of words
Song
sòng
The names of the princes of China in the Zhou Dynasty are in the area of Shangqiu City, Henan Province.
Chinese dynasty name: Southern Song Dynasty. Song Dynasty. Song Ci.
A unit of loudness, one song is approximately equal to one thousand times the loudness of the sound that human ears can just hear, equal to 1000 milli-songs.
name.
Song
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sòng］
["Guangyun" Su Tongqie, go to Song, heart. ]
(1) The names of the princes of the Zhou Dynasty. Child surname. After King Wu of Zhou extinguished the Shang Dynasty, he named Wu Geng, the king of Shang Dynasty, in the old capital of Shang Dynasty (now Shangqiu, Henan). When he became king, Wu Geng rebelled, was killed, and named his brother Qi Qi, named Song Gong, as Song State. In the early years of the Warring States Period, the capital was moved to Pengcheng (now Xuzhou, Jiangsu). It was destroyed by Qi in 286 BC. The jurisdiction is between eastern Henan and Shandong, Jiangsu and Anhui.
(2) The name of the dynasty. One of the Southern Dynasties. In 420 AD, Liu Yu, a soldier general of the northern part of the Jin Dynasty, proclaimed himself emperor in the Jin Dynasty, and his country was named Song, the capital was Jiankang (now Nanjing, Jiangsu), and his name was Liu Song in history. There are provinces in the Yangtze River Basin and the Pearl River Basin. It was replaced by Nan Qi in 479. A total of eight emperors, sixty years.
(3) Dynasty name. At the end of the Five Dynasties, in 960 AD, Zhao Kuangyin (Song Taizu) became the emperor of the Zhou Dynasty, the country was named Song, and the capital was Bianliang (now Kaifeng, Henan), which was called the Northern Song Dynasty in history. In the first year of Jingkang (1126) Jinbing attacked Bianliang, Huizong and Qinzong were captured, and died in the Northern Song Dynasty. In the following year, Zhao Gou (Song Gaozong) proclaimed emperor in Nanjing (now Shangqiu, Henan), and later built the capital Lin'an (now Hangzhou, Zhejiang), which was called the Southern Song Dynasty in history. The second year of Emperor Bing Xiangxing (1279) was destroyed by the Yuan Dynasty. There are 18 emperors in the Song Dynasty, 320 years.
(4) The name of the regime. At the end of the Sui Dynasty, the leader of the peasant uprising, Fu Gong Er, was the founding title of the country. Established in 623 AD, Danyang (now Nanjing, Jiangsu) was established as the capital, which is now southern Jiangsu and northern Zhejiang. It was destroyed by Tang in 624 AD.
(5) The name of the regime. At the end of the Yuan Dynasty, the Red Turban Army Liu Futong and others founded the country. AD 1
Song
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Yin Ji 1】【Lu Zi Department】　Song; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 282-12
[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Su Tongqie [Jiyun] Su Zongqie, send it to you. [Said Wen] Ju Ye, Cong Luo Cong Mu. [Xu Yue] Trees are built into houses, and people are also living.　 Also the name of the country, the land of the trinity, the Shangqiu of the Boss. [Zuo Zhuan·17th Year of Zhao] Song Dynasty, the emptiness of Dachen.　It is also the name of the prefecture. It was named Yingtian Mansion in the Sui Dynasty and Song Dynasty, and it is also the Guide Mansion in Henan Province today. Another surname.
Song

Song
Name meaning
：The name of the princes in the Zhou Dynasty in China; the name of the dynasties in China, the loudness unit.
宋 song
“宋”的本义是“居也”(《说文》)。
人们要安居,就离不开用木材盖房
屋、做家具,因此“~"(房屋)内存放
着“木”(也可以看作是“松”的省声)。
本义早已不存,常用于专有名词。
(同楷书)

宋家
Песня Песня
Первоначальное значение слова «Песня» - «Джуе» («Шуовэнь»).
Чтобы жить в мире, люди не могут обойтись без дерева, чтобы строить дома и делать мебель. Поэтому «~» (дом) хранит «дерево» (что также можно рассматривать как звук «сосна»).
Первоначальное значение давно ушло, и оно часто используется для имен собственных.

sòng
1) сунская эпоха; сунский (X―XIII вв.)
宋代 сунский период, сунская эпоха
唐宋八大家 восемь корифеев литературы эпохи Тан ― Сун
2) Сунская династия, династия Сун (а) первая дин. Сун 420―479 гг.; б) вторая дин. Сун 960―1279 гг.)
3) Сун (фамилия)
4) ист. Сун (владение потомков царского дома Инь в эпоху Чжоу, на территории нынешней пров. Хэнань)
5) сон (единица громкости)

宀 (значок У), 木 (дерево)
Сун (宋) — название нескольких династий в китайской истории: царство Сун (11 век до н.э. — 3 век до н.э.), династия Сун (420г. — 470г., также Лю Сун), империя или династия Сун (960г. — 1279г.). Обычно подразумевают последнюю.
Кандзи действительно больше ничего не значит, используется в именах.
Не путать: 栄 (さかえる、エイ расцвет).
宋そう
  • династия Сун (в Китае)
    • 入宋にっそう
  • путешествие в Китай (во времена династии Сун)
